alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 4:32AM CDT until June 29 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SMITH...NORTHEASTERN PHILLIPS AND FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 432 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Franklin, or 30 miles northeast of Phillipsburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Riverton around 445 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
